posts.post_content: For only two mana, you get a creature that is never obsolete. Absolutely fantastic. Even if it gets hit with [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt), they wasted one mana and one card to waste your two mana and one card. Not much of a loss.

posts.post_content:
@Omnei\_of\_Bant  
If you were here, I would give you candy for being the first person on Gatherer to use the term "Strictly better" in the same sentence as "Grizzly Bear" and actually nail it.  
  
Congratulations.  
  
On topic: Fantastic magnet of hate. And also, if you should manage to slip this into play and use it even once, it'd totally be worth it in my book. 1GG and discard an obsolete (or a creature that works better in a graveyard, like the aforementioned [Genesis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Genesis) or maybe even an [Evershrike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evershrike) in W/G) to tutor out any creature in your deck is pretty great. And if they bolt it, good on them, wasting a bolt on a 1G creature.  
  
4.5/5

@Omnei_of_Bant

And also, if you should manage to slip this into play and use it even once, it'd totally be worth it in my book. 1GG and discard an obsolete (or a creature that works better in a graveyard, like the aforementioned Genesis or maybe even an Evershrike in W/G) to tutor out any creature in your deck is pretty great. And if they bolt it, good on them, wasting a bolt on a 1G creature.

4.5/5

posts.post_content: This card is exceptionally powerful in EDH, especially with cards like [Mimeoplasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mimeoplasm) or [Lord of Extinction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of Extinction). You can fill the graveyard with creatures from your hand, while pumping other creatures you control and giving your commander options. All the while you are filling your hand with creatures you want! Makes [Living Death](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Living Death )  or [Grimoire of the Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grimoire of the Dead) both devastating and brutal.
posts.html:
This card is exceptionally powerful in EDH, especially with cards like Mimeoplasm or Lord of Extinction. You can fill the graveyard with creatures from your hand, while pumping other creatures you control and giving your commander options. All the while you are filling your hand with creatures you want! Makes Living Death or Grimoire of the Dead both devastating and brutal.
